attributes.action: TalkSport Radio must be made to let Alan Brazil attend The Cheltenham Festival in March
attributes.additional_details:
Alan Brazil at the Cheltenham Festival (March 13-16) is a national institution. Just because he has a tendency to not turn up for work for upto a week after it, the powers that be at TalkSport have decided to stop him going this year.

This petition is to force the government to intervene and threaten TalkSport with sanctions unless Alan Brazil is allowed to go to Cheltenham.
